newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Moody's confirms Boral debt ratings.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Moody's confirms Boral debt ratings.

text.p: Moody's Investors Service said on Monday it had confirmed the senior unsecured debt ratings of Boral Ltd and its guaranteed subsidiaries at A2 and the company's commercial paper rating at Prime-1.
The confirmation follows Boral's announcement that it plans to float off its gas distribution networks in South Australia, Queensland and the Northern Territory.
Boral said it expected the float of Envestra Ltd to raise more than A$850 million. It plans to retain a 19.9 percent stake in the company.
Moody's said it expected Boral would use the proceeds at first to reduce leverage and in the medium term to boost growth in the core businesses.
